name: Mark's Magnificent Marble Maze
description:
Unwind from the stress of daily life with this magnificent marble maze. Sit down, tilt the maze to roll the ball and relax while listening to atmospheric sounds and a variety of music in lush environments.

Easy to Play, Effortless to Master


The world is complicated enough and sometimes all you need is a place to let your mind wander. This is not a difficult game with complex puzzles, there are no timers, no leaderboards and most importantly, no pressure. It is a digital toy that invites you to relax, to breathe and to just for a moment let go of what was stressing you out in the real world.

Key Features

  • 200 mazes, ranging from relaxing to mildly challenging
  • 5 Beautifully rendered environments with atmospheric soundscapes
  • Relaxing music covering LoFi Beats, Piano Ballads, Relaxing Folk, Chilled Electronica and Retrowave
  • Realistic ball rolling, impact and environment sounds with a delicate ASMR-like quality
  • Zen Mode, which plays back your current progress as a soothing screensaver
  • Ability to skip up to three mazes at a time if you ever get stuck

200 hand-crafted Mazes


The 200 playfully designed mazes in Marks Magnificent Marble Maze offer exciting puzzles and hours of fun.

Five atmospheric Environments


Each of the five environments invokes a sense of calmness, be it through the gentle sound of rain in the night, the rippling waves at the lake shore, the crackling fire, the gentle shaking of a train or the quiet static of an old TV.

Steam Deck™ Support


Mark's Magnificent Marble Maze supports the Steam Deck™ including Gyro controls so you can play your mazes anywhere you go. The game provides two dedicated 60FPS graphics profiles, one for better graphics and the other for longer battery life. When using the "The Void" environment, the Steam Deck™ will draw as little as 10W on medium brightness, giving you hours of game play.

Tilt Five™ Support


Control the mazes by tilting your Tilt Five™ Wand and experience Marks Magnificent Marble Maze using the Tilt Five™ Glasses. Explore the beautifully rendered environments from new angles and play the game in holographic 3d.

Experimental VR Support


To learn more about experimental VR support, please visit this link: https://steamcommunity.com/games/1913200/announcements/detail/3371520484322619122
